Quote: Be fruitful and multiply and fill the earth and subdue it, and have dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the heavens and over every living thing that moves on the earth
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still
Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you
The battle is the Lord's, and he will give all of you into our hands
But as for you, be strong and do not give up, for your work will be rewarded
Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make our paths straight
And behold, I tell you these things that ye may learn wisdom; that ye may learn that when ye are in the service of your fellowbeings ye are only in the service of your God
Wherefore, do not spend money for that which is of no worth, nor your labor for that which cannot satisfy
And see that ye have faith, hope, and charity, and then ye will always abound in good works
